mapper.select: select ifnull(max(mm_merchant_no)+1,'100000') mm_merchant_no from cp_meracc where mm_phy_state='1' and length(mm_merchant_no)=6
select ifnull(max(mm_merchant_no)+1,'10000') mm_merchant_no from cp_meracc where mm_phy_state='0' and length(mm_merchant_no)=5
